content: this simple scarf is the perfect project for someone just starting to crochet this pattern consists of a youtube video and a written pattern in the form of a downloadable pdf the youtube video goes over every stitch used in the pattern in detail as well as how to make tassels **stitches included in this scarf ** chain - chain stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet scinc - single_crochet increase scdec - single_crochet decrease
